title: Meal plan recipe picker silently swallows API errors
description: MealPlanPage.tsx:162-163 catches errors loading recipes in the picker modal with catch { // Ignore }. If the API call fails, the user gets no feedback - just an empty or stale list. Same pattern in CookbookPage.tsx:453 (random recipe) and ViewRecipePage.tsx:222 (next random). Should show an error or at minimum log.
